item.title: Moody's says the banking system, private credit markets are sound despite worries over bad loans
item.description: Marc Pinto, the agency's head of global private credit, acknowledged in a CNBC interview that there are concerns over loose lending standards.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves premarket: Jefferies, Oracle, Fifth Third, Micron and more
item.description: These are the stocks posting the largest moves in premarket trading.

item.title: Chinese robotaxi company Pony.ai to work with Stellantis on Europe expansion
item.description: The companies plan to start robotaxi tests in Luxembourg in the coming months, before expanding to other parts of Europe next year.

item.title: Alibaba says its AI spending in e-commerce is already breaking even
